name: Kevin Thomas
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Self-reliant hard worker to become an asset to your team with 5 years experience in the marijuana industry. With vast knowledge of strains, edibles, and concentrates. Leadership roles were rewarded and I advanced to shift-lead/assistant manager. Works well with others while maintaining fast paced work ethics. Skills not limited to only sales; also skilled as receptionist, trimmer, buyer.
experience:
2012-2015 Budtender position where I worked in sales and reception. Maintained my own cash-wrap while helping patients in a face-paced fun environment. 
2015-2017 Shift-lead position, I helped motivate volunteers as well as made the managers work load less. Opened as well as closed out shop; counting out registers intake, cleaned to opening requirements, and payed out volunteers.
additionalInfo: Rewarded employee of the month in numerous occasions for dedicated work ethic. Maintained patient clientele and relationship as well as vendors.
